text: Yigal Arnon (9 December 1929 - 27 April 2014) was an Israeli lawyer. He was best known as the founder of Yigal Arnon & Co., one of the largest law firms in Israel. He was born in Tel Aviv. Arnon died on 27 April 2014 in Tel Aviv, aged 84. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Israeli Jews Category:Lawyers from Tel Aviv
title: Yigal Arnon
